sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0123 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM , LEVF_ABNC_DIV_CD , LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT , LEVF_ABNC_END_DT , TURTY_RNTMNT_DT , LEVF_ABNC_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , (select NVL(MAX(LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM)+1,1) from PSNL0123 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) , #levfAbncDivCd# , TO_CHAR( #levfAbncBgnnDt#, 'yyyymmdd') , TO_CHAR( #levfAbncEndDt#, 'yyyymmdd') , TO_CHAR( #turtyRntmntDt#, 'yyyymmdd') , #levfAbncNoteCtnt# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PSNL0123 SET REVN_DT= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , LEVF_ABNC_DIV_CD=#levfAbncDivCd# , LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT=TO_CHAR( #levfAbncBgnnDt#, 'yyyymmdd') , LEVF_ABNC_END_DT=TO_CHAR( #levfAbncEndDt#, 'yyyymmdd') , TURTY_RNTMNT_DT=TO_CHAR( #turtyRntmntDt#, 'yyyymmdd') , LEVF_ABNC_NOTE_CTNT=#levfAbncNoteCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM=#levfAbncSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PSNL0123 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM=#levfAbncSeilNum#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM , LEVF_ABNC_DIV_CD , to_date( LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT ,'yyyymmdd') LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT , to_date( LEVF_ABNC_END_DT ,'yyyymmdd') LEVF_ABNC_END_DT , to_date( TURTY_RNTMNT_DT ,'yyyymmdd') TURTY_RNTMNT_DT , LEVF_ABNC_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PSNL0123 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
AND LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM=#levfAbncSeilNum#

SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM , LEVF_ABNC_DIV_CD , LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT , LEVF_ABNC_END_DT , TURTY_RNTMNT_DT , LEVF_ABNC_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PSNL0123 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM=#levfAbncSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM , LEVF_ABNC_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,LEVF_ABNC_DIV_CD) AS LEVF_ABNC_DIV_NM , LEVF_ABNC_BGNN_DT , LEVF_ABNC_END_DT , TURTY_RNTMNT_DT , LEVF_ABNC_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PSNL0123 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , LEVF_ABNC_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PSNL0123 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
